mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no, notice_nick, notice_title, notice_content) values(${noticeNo}, #{noticeNick}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_no desc
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{noticeTitle}, notice_content=#{noticeContent}, notice_edittime=sysdate where notice_no=${noticeNo}
